mapper.select: select record.id , record.name , dutyDictionary.name as dutyDname , sysDepartment.name as departmentTitle from sys_account as record LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as dutyDictionary on record.duty_dcode = dutyDic.code left join sys_department as sysDepartment on record.department_id = sysDepartment.id where FIND_IN_SET(record.id, #{ids})
